question: Which among the following define the similarities between Buddhism and Jainism?
option1: Both opposed Brahmanical domination and caste system
option2: Both accepted the theories of rebirth
explanation: The similarities between Buddhism and Jainism are a) Both opposed Brahmanical domination and caste system. B) Both have accepted the theories of Karma and rebirth and Moksha. C) Both preached truth, non-violence, celibacy and detachment from material comforts.. D) Both Uphold the essence of Vedas.
